casebody.data:
BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON
v.
Stacy LINDSEY, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2017

Heather Kryger, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Peter A. Ventre, in opposition.

*454The defendant Heather Kryger's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40140) is denied.
